name: Mini Turbo GP
description:
The race is about to start!!
Get the first place by challenging other cars!
Unlock new tracks and new pilots with different skills!

Start from beginning the CAREER mode and become the World Champion!

FEATURES:
- 18 different tracks
- 25 different cars
- Bonus characters (Zombie, Aliens, Grandmothers...)
- 100 different races
- Special games (Knock down cones, Crush chickens)
- Special cars (ice cream truck, legendary 500, the Mini, old F1 cars)
- Nitro, Tires, and bonus points on race
- Three different controls (pad, joystick, tilt)
- Achievements
- BONUS GAME on podium
- Facebook sharing

ONLINE CHALLENGES!
- Races up to 10 opponents, Time Attack, Vs, Challenge, Long Race...

RETRO GAMES FANS:
Turn on or/off the visual mode: OLD COLOR TV!
